frontend.title: 2D Minecraft
frontend.subtitle: 2 Dimensional Minecraft
frontend.description: Dive into an epic single-player adventure of 2D Minecraft! Explore infinite worlds, build anything you can imagine, and conquer unique challenges. Unleash your creativity, craft legendary items, and survive in a world of endless possibilities. Get ready to embark on your ultimate journey today!

frontend.title: Chess Game
frontend.subtitle: Online chess game
frontend.description: Play against AI at various difficulty levels, or log in to challenge other players online. Compete and climb the leaderboard to the top! Hit 'PLAY' now and join the fun!

frontend.title: Rubik's Cube
frontend.subtitle: Online interactive puzzle game
frontend.description: Are you familiar with the famous Rubik's Cube? Challenge yourself with an online version with custom settings.

frontend.title: To Do App
frontend.subtitle: A simple todo list
frontend.description: Stay organized and boost your productivity with my intuitive To-Do List app! Easily create, manage, and prioritize tasks to keep your day on track. Set reminders, check off completed items, and achieve your goals effortlessly. Simplify your life with the ultimate task manager today!

frontend.title: Wave Packet
frontend.subtitle: A wave packet simulation
frontend.description: A simulation of Physical concepts in Physics - wave: phase, velocity, wavelength, and pulse width.

frontend.title: Wave Interference
frontend.subtitle: A spherical wave simulation
frontend.description: A simulation of Physical experiment: Interference of Spherical Waves.

frontend.title: Predefined Dice Roll
frontend.subtitle: A spherical wave simulation
frontend.description: Choose the number of dice total result and you are guaranteed to get the same result every time you roll the dice.

backend.title: API Project
backend.subtitle: Backend API
backend.description: A robust API for handling complex backend operations.

ai.title: AI Project
ai.subtitle: Machine Learning
ai.description: A machine learning project that predicts outcomes based on data.
